messages.subject: what we're doing right now
messages.msgSnippet: Quinn, 9, is watching The Two Towers for the manyeth time. When I am off the computer, I will probably continue reading to him from The Family Tree by Sheri
messages.messageBody:
Quinn, 9, is watching The Two Towers for the manyeth time. When I am off the
computer, I will probably continue reading to him from "The Family Tree" by
Sheri Tepper (a great book!).

Zoe, 13, is staying at my sister's for 3 days to babysit while she is in
California (my mom will sleep there at night too). Have no idea what she's
doing though I know that a partial list of what she brought to read while
they are in school includes: Herodotus, Sophocles, The Poisonwood Bible, and
Foxtrot <g>.


Paula
